name: Wheat
notes: Keep wheat dry and cool to prevent weevil infestation and mycotoxin development. Moisture content should stay below 14% for safe long-term storage.

name: Maize (Corn)
notes: Maize is highly susceptible to aflatoxin contamination under warm, humid conditions. Regular aeration and inspection are essential.

name: Garlic

name: Carrot
